data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Shaki-Zaqatala, Azerbaijan to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Shaki-Zaqatala, Azerbaijan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Shaki-Zaqatala access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Shaki-Zaqatala, Azerbaijan.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Shaki-Zaqatala, Azerbaijan.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 63,000 people living in Shaki-Zaqatala, Azerbaijan. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Turk, Meskhetian people. Make the Turk, Meskhetian people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Shaki-Zaqatala, Azerbaijan to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Shaki-Zaqatala, Azerbaijan from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Shaki-Zaqatala to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...
